thread.title: Junelaine
thread.title_full: Bake Me A Wish! reviewed by Junelaine

author: Junelaine
title: Junelaine
text: I recently ordered a red velvet birthday cake for my husband and later found out that I needed to change the date that it needs to be received. I immediately contacted customer service and the changed the date with no issues. It arrived on time and my husband said the cake was delicious! Although the little round happy birthday plaque was moved all the way to the top, I assumed it was from the shipping but would definitely recommend and will still order in the future.
